name: Stunt King
description:
-Start with easy scooter, collect coins to buy better motorbikes!
-Can you handle fast turbobikes?
-Beat your records and become a real stuntman.
-Difficult rises when you wheelie long time.
-Tilt your phone while burning rubber with brake.
-Expert mode with manual transmission.
-Leaderboards(Game center login required)
-Facebook friends leaderboards.
